QuestData.Title: Hero's Call: Feralas!
QuestData.Description: By order of his royal highness, King Anduin Wrynn, all able-bodied citizens of the Alliance are to report to Telaron Windflight at Dreamer's Rest in Feralas.$B$BThe Alliance needs your help to overcome our enemies, the Horde and the Grimtotems. You can reach Dreamer's Rest by traveling south from Desolace into Feralas.$B$BFor the glory and honor of the Alliance!
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Telaron Windflight at Dreamer's Rest in Feralas.
QuestData.RewardText: Elune has favored us with your arrival, $c. There is much to do.
